content.rendered:
Experience:

  • 5 years IT experience and 3 years in experience in Certification and Accreditation/A&A,
  • Knowledgeable and trained in RMF process, NIST SP 800-37, NIST SP 800-53, CNSSI 1253
  • Demonstrates mid-level experience in risk analysis, control validation, and as a Security Control Assessor Representative.
  • Skilled in different technologies – Microsoft, Linux, network, Cloud, CDS, etc.
  • Experience with A&A, DoD IS’, policies

Responsibilities

  • Validate the RMF controls, conduct a risk assessment, and recommending on authorization decision.
  • Evaluate web content filtering, ports and protocols, OPORDs and Red Team analyses, ACAS/STIGs’

Note: On-site performance is required for this task at each of the three (3) Government sites – Letterkenny Army Depot Ft. Meade, MD, Mark Center.  Partial telework may be authorized for this task at the discretion of the Government.  Telework must be approved in writing by the COR

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)
